title: IIT Kanpur Notification 2025 - Apply Online for Project Technical Officer Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur (IIT Kanpur) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Technical Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc, Diploma can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can fill out the application form on or before the last date of application. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to ap...
